body_html: The reason why the script continues even when commands fail is because the script does not set -e. Perhaps we should set set -e and some other shell settings in the configure script as described by Writing Safe Shell Scripts.
body_text: The reason why the script continues even when commands fail is because the script does not set -e. Perhaps we should set set -e and some other shell settings in the configure script as described by Writing Safe Shell Scripts.
body: The reason why the script continues even when commands fail is because the script does not `set -e`. Perhaps we should set `set -e` and some other shell settings in the `configure` script as described by [Writing Safe Shell Scripts](https://sipb.mit.edu/doc/safe-shell/).
